knownConflicts.description: Only one farm map can be active at a time. Choose between Overgrown Garden Farm, Waterfall Forest Farms, Beach Farm Redone, or vanilla farms.
knownConflicts.resolution: Select one farm type in GMCM or disable others

knownConflicts.description: SVE has its own Grandpa's Farm which may conflict with other farm mods.
knownConflicts.resolution: Use SVE's farm or configure compatibility in GMCM

mods: Multiple portrait mods for same NPC
knownConflicts.description: Portrait replacements may conflict if multiple mods change the same character.
knownConflicts.resolution: Load order matters - last loaded wins. Adjust via manifest.json
